body_html: @nbenhaim Yes and no. I can compile the .so using cc_binary + linkshared and I can load the graph from the host language using the C API and an FFI interface. The values I get back from the graph don't make sense though. I'll be playing with it over Thanksgiving and will definitely publish my results here.

body: @nbenhaim Yes and no. I can compile the .so using `cc_binary` + `linkshared` and I can load the graph from the host language using the C API and an FFI interface. The values I get back from the graph don't make sense though. I'll be playing with it over Thanksgiving and will definitely publish my results here.
